name: KIVIK Sofa
description: Cuddle up in the comfortable KIVIK sofa. The generous size, low armrests and pocket springs with foam that adapts to the body invites you and your guests to many hours of socializing and relaxation.

name: MÖRBYLÅNGA Dining Table
description: The oak top layer and dovetail joints give the table a solid, crafted expression. This table is full of character and since it's round, you can always find space for at least one more friend.

name: POÄNG Armchair
description: POÄNG armchair has stylish curved lines in bentwood, providing nice support for the neck and comfy resilience. It's been in our range for several decades and is still just as popular. Want to try it too?

name: MALM Bed Frame
description: A clean design that's just as beautiful on all sides – place the bed on its own or with the headboard against a wall. If you need space for extra bedding, add MALM bed storage boxes on casters.

name: LACK Coffee Table
description: LACK table in black-brown is easy to match with other furnishings. The honeycomb structured paper filling construction adds strength to the table while keeping it lightweight so it´s easy to move around.

name: BILLY Bookcase
description: BILLY bookcase is a beloved icon that never goes out of style. Thanks to its versatility you can use it in many different ways at home – regardless of whether you store books or everyday items in it.

name: HEMNES Dresser
description: A classic chest of drawers in solid wood, with a traditional look and modern functions like quiet, smooth-running drawers. The drawer interlock reduce the tip-over risk when combined with wall-anchoring.

name: KALLAX Shelf Unit
description: Standing or lying – the KALLAX series adapts to taste, space and budget. Personalize the shelving unit with inserts and boxes to make it suit your needs.

name: UPPLAND Armchair
description: This can easily become your favourite place at home. EKTORP armchair is welcoming and generous with comfy soft and supportive cushions – and the cover is also removable and machine washable.

name: DANDERYD Dining Table
description: A table for 4 with a durable surface in lacquered MDF and softly shaped steel legs. Here, it's the small details that create a perfect unity of beauty and strength that feels both traditional and modern.

name: BRIMNES TV Unit
description: When it's organized by the TV it's easier to indulge in your favorite TV series. Keep your games, controls and accessories in the large drawers and feed the cords through the outlets in the back.

name: FRIHETEN Sleeper Sofa
description: After a good night's sleep, you can effortlessly convert your bedroom or guest room into a living room again. The built-in storage is easy to access and spacious enough to store bedding, books and PJs.

name: PAX Wardrobe
description: Do you dream of a beautiful wardrobe for your bedroom? Here´s the solution for you! Start with frames, after that add KOMPLEMENT series that stores all your clothes, shoes and accessories. In the end, just personalize it by adding your favorite doors.

name: STRANDMON Wing Chair
description: Bringing new life to an old favorite. We first introduced this chair in the 1950's. Some 60 years later we brought it back into the range with the same craftsmanship, comfort and appearance. Enjoy!

name: HEMNES Coffee Table
description: Natural beauty in solid pine. A durable and renewable material that maintains its genuine character with each passing year. Looks great together with other furniture in the HEMNES series.

name: TROTTEN Desk
description: Changing positions from sitting to standing is good for you, and the crank handle allows you to work your arms while adjusting the height. Moving your body makes you both feel and work better.

name: NORDLI Chest of Drawers
description: Keep everything from clothes to accessories organized with NORDLI chest of drawers. It comes in various sizes that looks great when combined, all in Scandinavian clean design with soft-closing drawers.

name: SÖDERHAMN Sectional Sofa
description: If you like the stylish airy look, you have to try the deep generous seats. Create your own personal combination of SÖDERHAMN sofa, then sit down and relax – by yourself or together with the whole family.

name: LISABO Side Table
description: We're proud of our LISABO series, awarded with the prestigious, international Red Dot Award, for its design. The products are durable, sturdy and easy to assemble, yet look light and hand-crafted.

name: FJÄLLBO Shelf Unit
description: A perfect shelving unit for a rustic look. The metal gives an industrial feel and the solid wood makes every piece of furniture unique. The open back also makes it easy to access power sockets.

name: SONGESAND Bed Frame
description: A sturdy bed frame with soft, profile edges and high legs. A classic shape that will last for many years. Also, there are spacious storage boxes under the bed where you can store bedding or clothes.

name: SKÅDIS Pegboard
description: Perfect for your home office, but goes just as well in a bathroom, hallway or kitchen to have small items close at hand. Complete with SKÅDIS accessories to create the best storage for your needs.

name: NORDEN Gateleg Table
description: Gateleg tables have been around for centuries – with the space-saving design it's no wonder why. We gave this table a straightforward, Scandinavian look and added a few drawers for flatware and napkins.

name: BESTÅ TV Storage Combination
description: BESTÅ TV storage combinations provide a home for your TV and storage for the gadgets you need for all the activities around it. Hide the clutter and display your favorite things in one magnificent combo!

name: KULLEN Chest of Drawers
description: A simple chest of drawers with a clean look and room for both your favorite clothes and extra bedding. The feet act as a built-in support and reduce the risk of tip-over when combined with wall-anchoring.

name: BEKANT Sit/Stand Desk
description: Shift between sitting and standing throughout your workday with this electrically height-adjustable desk. The smooth motor lets you adjust from sitting to standing height with a simple press of a button, helping you keep an active and ergonomic work position.

name: EKTORP Sofa
description: A timeless sofa that's a perfect example of traditional design with generous proportions and relaxed comfort. Reversible, spring-core seat cushions provide support for your body and quickly regain their shape when you get up.

name: VIMLE Sectional Sofa
description: Create your own perfect sofa combination with the modular VIMLE series. Sections can be arranged and rearranged to suit your space, and you can add more sections at any time. Deep seats, generous dimensions and pocket springs provide excellent comfort.

name: FÄRLÖV Sofa
description: Generous and inviting with soft, rounded armrests and seat cushions filled with high resilience foam and polyester fibers that provide excellent comfort. The velvet cover creates depth through its light reflection and soft feeling.

name: LANDSKRONA Sofa
description: A sleek and modern sofa with slim legs that lift the frame off the floor, giving the sofa a light and airy feel. The leather is soft and supple, and develops a beautiful patina over time. Metal legs add a contemporary touch.

name: KLIPPAN Loveseat
description: This compact sofa has been a favorite since the 1980s. The simple, clean design with chromed-steel tube legs works in many different homes. Durable metal springs in the seat provide excellent support for both sitting and lying down.

name: GRÖNLID Sofa
description: The generous dimensions, soft armrests and seat cushions filled with high resilience foam and polyester fibers make GRÖNLID incredibly comfortable. Perfect for the entire family to enjoy relaxed evenings together or lazy days on your own.

name: VALLENTUNA Modular Sofa
description: VALLENTUNA seating series allows you to create a sofa in different sizes and shapes to perfectly suit your space. Each module has a built-in storage compartment and can be used as a freestanding piece or connected to others in the series.

name: BRIMNES Bed Frame
description: This bed frame has storage boxes underneath that are perfect for storing extra quilts and pillows. The adjustable bed sides allow you to use mattresses of different thicknesses. The four drawers give you plenty of storage space.

name: HEMNES Daybed
description: With this daybed you quickly and easily create space for overnight guests. Simply pull out the bed base and you get a double bed. The large drawers provide plenty of storage space for bedlinens and pillows.

name: NORDLI Bed Frame
description: A bed frame with hidden storage and a sleek, minimalist design. The drawers roll out smoothly and quietly, with built-in dampers, and the headboard has a hidden shelf with a cable outlet for charging devices while you sleep.

name: IDANÄS Bed Frame
description: A traditional bed with a timeless look that combines well with other furniture. The high headboard is comfortable to lean against when reading or watching TV in bed. Made from solid wood, which is a durable natural material.

name: SLÄKT Extendable Bed
description: A practical bed that grows with your child. The bed base can be extended from 4'11" to 6'7" and the mattress from 3'3" x 4'11" to 3'3" x 6'7". Perfect for children who grow quickly during their early years.

name: TUFJORD Upholstered Bed
description: A luxurious bed with a high, curved headboard that creates a hotel feeling at home. The headboard is comfortable to lean against while reading or watching TV in bed. The upholstery adds a soft touch to your bedroom.

name: LEIRVIK Bed Frame
description: A romantic bed frame with decorative details that add character to your bedroom. The curved lines and metal scrollwork create a light, airy look. The high footboard keeps bedding from falling off while you sleep.

name: STORÅ Loft Bed Frame
description: Make the most of your space with this loft bed that creates room for a workspace, seating area, or storage underneath. Made of solid wood, which is a durable natural material, and the high bed allows good air circulation.

name: UTÅKER Stackable Bed
description: Two beds in one - perfect for small spaces or when guests stay over. The beds can be stacked to save space, placed side by side, or placed in an L-shape. You can complement with KNAPSTAD or MALFORS mattresses, sold separately.

name: LÅNGFJÄLL Office Chair
description: An ergonomic office chair with a gently curved back and armrests that provide good support. The seat height and tilt are adjustable, allowing you to customize the chair for maximum comfort throughout your workday.

name: MARKUS Office Chair
description: This chair has been tested for office use and meets the requirements for safety, durability, and stability. The mesh backrest lets air through, keeping your back cool even during long sitting periods. The built-in lumbar support helps reduce back strain.

name: ODGER Chair
description: Made from at least 50% recycled plastic and renewable wood, this chair combines environmental consciousness with comfort. The bowl-shaped seat and rounded backrest make long dinners comfortable, and the click-in assembly requires no tools.

name: INGOLF Dining Chair
description: A traditional dining chair made of solid wood, which is a durable material that ages beautifully. The simple, timeless design harmonizes with many different table and home styles. Perfect for everyday use and entertaining guests.

name: NILSOVE Armchair
description: Each handwoven chair is unique, with excellent support for your back and natural fibers that breathe, making the chair comfortable to sit on. The materials - rattan and bamboo - are renewable and help reduce our climate impact.

name: RÅGRUND Chair
description: This bamboo chair is perfect for the bathroom or other wet areas, as the material withstands moisture well. The curved shape provides comfortable support whether you're getting dressed or need a place to sit while brushing your teeth.

name: TERJE Folding Chair
description: This folding chair is easy to fold up and hang on the wall to save space when not in use. The curved backrest provides excellent sitting comfort, making it comfortable even during longer dinners. Perfect extra seating when guests arrive.

name: YPPERLIG Chair
description: This injection-molded plastic chair combines comfort with sleek design. The seat and backrest are designed for optimal sitting comfort, and the beech wood legs add warmth to the modern design. Perfect for both dining and office use.

name: RÖNNINGE Chair
description: The curved backrest is adapted to the natural curve of your spine, providing excellent back support. Made of solid wood from sustainable sources, this chair is durable and will last for many years.

name: NORRARYD Chair
description: A classic dining chair with a tall back and slim legs that give it an elegant look. The chair is made of solid wood, making it sturdy and durable. The curved backrest and seat provide good sitting comfort.

name: HOLMVIK Bookcase
description: A simple, versatile bookcase that can be used for everything from books to decorative items. The adjustable shelves allow you to customize the storage to fit your needs. It's a popular classic that's been around for decades.

name: LUNARP Shelf Unit
description: A versatile storage solution that can be placed on the floor or mounted on the wall. The square compartments are perfect for storing books, bins, or decorative items. You can add inserts to create closed storage.

name: IVAR Storage System
description: A customizable solid wood storage system that can be arranged in many different ways. The untreated pine can be painted, stained, or oiled according to your preferences. Adjustable shelves let you adapt the space according to your needs.

name: EKET Cabinet
description: Create your own unique storage solution with these stackable cabinets. They can be mounted on the wall or placed on the floor, and arranged in countless combinations. Perfect for small living spaces.

name: BROR Shelving Unit
description: A sturdy shelving unit perfect for heavy items in your garage, basement, or utility room. The metal construction can hold up to 285 lbs per shelf, making it perfect for tools, paint cans, and other heavy items.

name: FJÄLKINGE Shelving Unit
description: A sleek and modern open shelving unit with a powder-coated steel frame. The clean design works well in many different rooms and settings. The adjustable shelves let you adapt the storage as needed.

name: ALGOT Wall Mounting System
description: A versatile wall-mounted storage system that can be customized to fit your space and needs. Perfect for laundry rooms, closets, and other spaces where you need flexible storage solutions.

name: TRONES Shoe Cabinet
description: A slim shoe cabinet that takes up minimal floor space while providing storage for 6-8 pairs of shoes. The top surface can be used for keys, accessories, or decorative items. Perfect for narrow hallways and entryways.

name: HEMNES Shoe Cabinet
description: A traditional-style shoe cabinet with tilting compartments that make it easy to see and access your shoes. Each compartment holds about 4 pairs of shoes, and the flat top provides display space for decorative items.

name: ELVARLI Storage System
description: A customizable open storage system that can be used to create a wardrobe or room divider. The clean, minimalist design works well in modern interiors, and the adjustable components let you create a solution that fits your space perfectly.

name: MELLTORP Table
description: A simple, durable table with a melamine tabletop that is heat and scratch resistant. The clean design makes it easy to combine with different chairs and interior styles. Perfect for kitchens, dining rooms, or as a desk.

name: TORVALD Table
description: A table with a warm, natural expression made from ash veneer. The wood texture and grain pattern give each table a unique character. The legs are easy to mount and attach with a single fitting, saving you time during assembly.

name: DOCKSTA Table
description: A round dining table with a classic tulip-shaped base that saves space and makes it easy to get in and out. The white finish brightens your room and combines well with many different chair styles and colors.

name: NORRÅKER Table
description: A sturdy table made from solid birch, a durable natural material that can withstand heavy use. The clear-lacquered surface is easy to wipe clean. Perfect for the kitchen or a small dining area.

name: TÄRENDÖ Table
description: A compact dining table that fits even in limited spaces. The simple design with clean lines makes it easy to place in any setting. The melamine tabletop is heat and scratch resistant, making it perfect for everyday use.

name: RÖNNINGE Table
description: A table with rounded corners and edges that give it a soft, friendly expression. Made from solid birch, a durable natural material that ages beautifully. The clear lacquer finish makes it easy to wipe clean.

name: INGATORP Table
description: An extendable dining table with a traditional look. When extended, it seats 4-6 people comfortably. The white painted finish is easy to coordinate with different chairs and interior styles.

name: ÄPPLARÖ Table
description: An outdoor dining table made from acacia wood, a durable hardwood suitable for outdoor use. The wood has been pre-treated with wood stain to extend its life. Perfect for garden parties and outdoor dining.

name: NORBO Wall-mounted Table
description: A wall-mounted drop-leaf table that folds flat against the wall when not in use, perfect for small spaces. Made from solid birch, a durable natural material. Can be used as a workspace or dining table.

name: VANGSTA Extendable Table
description: A dining table with a simple, modern design that's easy to extend when guests arrive. The slim profile makes it perfect for smaller spaces, and the white finish brightens up your room.

name: ALEX Drawer Unit
description: A drawer unit with clean lines that fits under most desks. The drawers have built-in stops and run smoothly even when heavily loaded. Perfect for storing papers, office supplies, or arts and crafts materials.

name: BEKANT Desk
description: An electrically height-adjustable desk that lets you alternate between sitting and standing throughout your workday. The veneer tabletop is durable, stain resistant, and easy to clean. Includes a 10-year guarantee.

name: IDÅSEN Desk
description: A desk with an industrial look featuring a durable powder-coated steel frame and a tabletop with a melamine finish that resists stains and scratches. The height is adjustable to create a comfortable workspace.

name: SKARSTA Desk
description: A height-adjustable desk with a hand crank that lets you switch between sitting and standing. The simple, clean design fits in many settings, and the sturdy construction ensures stability even at maximum height.

name: FREDDE Gaming Desk
description: A desk designed with gamers in mind, featuring raised shelves for screens, a wide surface for keyboard and mouse, and built-in cable management. The sturdy construction ensures stability during intense gaming sessions.

name: GALANT Storage System
description: A professional office storage system with lockable drawers and cabinets. The clean, minimalist design fits in many office environments, and the modular components can be combined in different ways to suit your needs.

name: MICKE Desk
description: A compact desk with built-in storage that fits in limited spaces. The cable outlet at the back keeps cords and cables organized. The drawer can be mounted on the right or left according to your needs.

name: THYGE Desk
description: A sturdy desk with a durable melamine tabletop that resists scratches and stains. The steel legs provide stability, and the adjustable feet make it possible to level the desk on uneven floors.

name: TROTTEN Desk
description: A minimalist desk with a clean design that fits in many different environments. The particleboard tabletop is durable and easy to clean. The simple construction makes assembly quick and easy.

name: HÄLLAN Storage Combination
description: A metal storage combination with lockable doors that's perfect for offices and commercial spaces. The units can be stacked or placed side by side, and the doors close silently thanks to the integrated dampers.

name: GODMORGON Sink Cabinet
description: A bathroom sink cabinet with drawers that fully extend for better visibility and access. The drawers close softly and quietly thanks to the integrated dampers. The high-gloss finish is moisture resistant and easy to clean.

name: LILLÅNGEN Bathroom Cabinet
description: A narrow bathroom cabinet with mirror doors that provides storage without taking up too much space. Perfect for small bathrooms. The adjustable shelves let you customize the storage to suit your needs.

name: ENHET Bathroom Series
description: A flexible bathroom furniture series with open and closed storage that can be combined in many different ways. The simple design with rounded corners is easy to clean and creates a fresh, modern look.

name: BROGRUND Shower Set
description: A complete shower set with a thermostatic mixer that maintains your chosen water temperature. The height-adjustable shower rail makes it comfortable for the whole family. The chrome finish is durable and easy to clean.

name: VOXNAN Bathroom Accessories
description: A coordinated set of bathroom accessories with a modern design and chrome finish. The set includes towel rails, toilet roll holders, soap dispensers, and more. Mix and match to create a cohesive look in your bathroom.

name: TISKEN Suction Storage
description: Bathroom storage accessories with strong suction cups that attach securely to smooth surfaces without drilling. Perfect for renters or those who don't want to damage tiles. Easy to move and reposition as needed.

name: VILTO Bathroom Stool
description: A bathroom stool made from bamboo, a durable and renewable material that can withstand moisture. The shelf underneath provides storage space for towels or other bathroom items. Perfect for children to reach the sink.

name: HEMNES Bathroom Storage
description: A traditional-style bathroom storage unit with shelves and a drawer. The solid wood construction adds warmth to your bathroom, and the open shelves provide easy access to towels and toiletries.

name: RÅGRUND Towel Rack
description: A towel rack made from bamboo, a durable and moisture-resistant material perfect for bathrooms. The compact design works well in small spaces, and the shelf provides additional storage for toiletries or decorative items.

name: TÖRNVIKEN Countertop Sink
description: A round countertop sink with a modern design that sits on top of your bathroom vanity or countertop. The white ceramic is easy to clean and creates a fresh, clean look. Combines well with many different bathroom styles.

name: RANARP Work Lamp
description: A vintage-inspired work lamp with adjustable arm and head that directs light where you need it. The steel shade and details create an industrial look, while the textile cord adds a tactile touch.

name: HEKTAR Pendant Lamp
description: An industrial-style pendant lamp with a wide metal shade that spreads light effectively over dining tables or kitchen islands. The steel shade has small perforations at the top that create decorative light patterns.

name: SKURUP Ceiling Lamp
description: A simple, modern ceiling lamp with a metal shade that directs light downward. The matte black finish creates a bold contrast in light-colored interiors. Perfect for hallways, bedrooms, or living rooms.

name: SINNERLIG Pendant Lamp
description: A pendant lamp with a handmade bamboo shade that creates a warm, natural ambiance. Each shade is unique with subtle variations in the bamboo structure. The natural material adds texture and warmth to your home.

name: STRÅLA LED Light Chain
description: A decorative LED light chain perfect for creating a cozy atmosphere during holidays or everyday use. The energy-efficient LED bulbs emit a warm white light and have a long lifespan of approximately 25,000 hours.

name: VILMAR Armchair
description: A comfortable armchair with a bentwood frame that provides restful resilience. The layer-glued bent birch frame offers strength and flexibility, while the high back provides good support for your neck. A classic design since 1976.

name: ASGARDA Sofa
description: A comfortable sofa with a classic design that never goes out of style. The removable, machine-washable covers make it easy to keep clean, and the reversible back cushions can be flipped for even wear. Perfect for family living.

name: SODERVIK Sofa
description: A modular sofa series that lets you create your own combination. The deep seats, comfortable armrests and pocket springs that follow your body provide excellent comfort. The cover is easy to remove and machine wash.
